name: Slime Cleaning Co.
description:
Help the slime at Slime Cleaning Co. clean up the dungeons left in a mess by adventurers! 

How to play: 

Use 'WASD' to move around the dungeon.

Use 'E' to interact.

Use 'SPACE' to play the minigames.

Find and absorb the right tools to clean up the different types of messes left behind by adventurers. Use the fireman's hose to absorb water from the pool by holding 'E' to fill your water tank. Be careful not to fill up your tank too much or you might not fit through the doors! Put out the fires holding the hose by interacting and completing a mini game. You'll have to go back to the pool to refill your tank if it empties. Use the mop and bucket to clean up spills, and use the toolbox to fix broken furniture around the dungeon also by completing a mini game. 

Try your best to clean up the dungeon as fast as you can to get to the top of the leader board!
